ai:f.c: Sets any variable in a loaded Tiri script.
ai:f.p: ERR fl::SetVariable(OBJECTPTR Script, CSTRING Name, INT Type, ...)

ai:i.c: The name of the variable to set.
A valid field type must be indicated, e.g. FD_STRING, FD_POINTER, FD_INT, FD_DOUBLE, FD_INT64.
A variable that matches the indicated Type.
